TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CancellationToken extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 传播有关应取消操作的通知。

span.span: Propagates notification that operations should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用线程、线程池工作项或对象之间的协作取消 。A enables cooperative cancellation between threads, thread pool work items, or objects. 可以通过实例化对象来创建取消标记 ，该对象管理从其属性检索的取消标记 。You create a cancellation token by instantiating a object, which manages cancellation tokens retrieved from its property. 然后，将取消标记传递给应接收取消通知的任意数量的线程、任务或操作。You then pass the cancellation token to any number of threads, tasks, or operations that should receive notice of cancellation. 标记无法用于启动取消。The token cannot be used to initiate cancellation. 当拥有对象调用时 ， 取消标记的每个副本上的属性都设置为 `true` 。When the owning object calls , the property on every copy of the cancellation token is set to `true`. 接收通知的对象可以采用任何适当的方式进行响应。The objects that receive the notification can respond in whatever manner is appropriate. 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅 [托管线程中的取消](/dotnet/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads)。For more information and code examples see [Cancellation in Managed Threads](/dotnet/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads). ## Examples 下面的示例使用随机数生成器来模拟数据收集应用程序，该应用程序从第11个不同乐器读取10个整数值。The following example uses a random number generator to emulate a data collection application that reads 10 integral values from eleven different instruments. 如果值为零，则指示度量值对一个检测失败，在这种情况下，应取消该操作，而不应计算整体平均值。A value of zero indicates that the measurement has failed for one instrument, in which case the operation should be cancelled and no overall mean should be computed. 为了处理可能取消的操作，此示例实例化一个 对象，该对象生成一个传递给对象的取消标记 。To handle the possible cancellation of the operation, the example instantiates a object that generates a cancellation token that's passed to a object. 然后，该 对象将取消标记传递给负责收集特定检测的读取的每个任务。In turn, the object passes the cancellation token to each of the tasks responsible for collecting readings for a particular instrument. 调用方法以确保仅在成功收集所有读数后计算平均值。The method is called to ensure that the mean is computed only after all readings have been gathered successfully. 如果任务由于被取消而未完成，则该 方法将引发异常。If a task has not completed because it was cancelled, the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/cs/cancel1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/vb/cancel1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 的所有公共和受保护的成员 都是线程安全的，可从多个线程并发使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool canceled) cil managed

param.name: canceled
param.span: 标记的已取消状态。

span.span: The canceled state for the token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的标记将保留在由参数指定的已取消状态 `canceled` 。Tokens created with this constructor will remain in the canceled state specified by the `canceled` parameter. 如果 `canceled` 为 `false` ，则 和都 将为 `false` 。If `canceled` is `false`, both and will be `false`. 如果 `canceled` 为 `true` ，则 和都 将为 `true` 。If `canceled` is `true`, both and will be `true`.

public: property bool CanBeCanceled { bool get(); };

[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取此标记是否能处于已取消状态。

span.span: Gets whether this token is capable of being in the canceled state.

value.span: 如果此令牌能够处于已取消状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this token is capable of being in the canceled state; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 返回 `false` ，则保证令牌永远不会转换为已取消状态，这意味着 将永远不会返回 `true` 。If returns `false`, it is guaranteed that the token will never transition into a canceled state, meaning that will never return `true`. 静态属性返回一个无法取消的取消标记 。A cancellation token that cannot be canceled is returned by the static property. 您可以选择使用此属性来确定在检查属性值之前是否可以取消取消标记 ，以确定是否已取消。You can optionally use this property to determine whether a cancellation token can be canceled before examining the value of the property to determine whether it has been canceled.

summary.span: 确定当前的 实例是否等于指定的标记。

span.span: Determines whether the current instance is equal to the specified token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果满足以下任一条件，则两个取消标记相等：Two cancellation tokens are equal if any one of the following conditions is true: - 它们与相同 。They are associated with the same . - 它们都是从公共 构造函数构造的，它们的 值相等。They were both constructed from public constructors, and their values are equal. - 这两个取消标记的值为 。The value of both cancellation tokens is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCancellationRequested As Boolean
public: property bool IsCancellationRequested { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取是否已请求取消此标记。

span.span: Gets whether cancellation has been requested for this token.

value.span: 如果此令牌已请求取消，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if cancellation has been requested for this token; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示是否已为此标记请求取消，无论是通过最初以已取消状态构造的令牌，还是通过 对关联的令牌调用 。This property indicates whether cancellation has been requested for this token, either through the token initially being constructed in a canceled state, or through calling on the token's associated . 如果此属性为 `true` ，则只保证已请求取消。If this property is `true`, it only guarantees that cancellation has been requested. 它不保证每个已注册的处理程序已完成执行，也不保证取消请求已完成传播到所有已注册的处理程序。It does not guarantee that every registered handler has finished executing, nor that cancellation requests have finished propagating to all registered handlers. 可能需要更多的同步，尤其是在同时取消相关对象的情况下。Additional synchronization may be required, particularly in situations where related objects are being canceled concurrently. ## Examples 下面是一个简单的示例，在属性返回之前执行服务器进程 `true` 。The following is a simple example that executes a server process until the property returns `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested/cs/cancellation.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested/vb/cancelthreads.vb#12)] 该示例实例化一个 对象，该对象控制对取消标记的访问。The example instantiates a object, which controls access to the cancellation token. 然后，它定义了两个线程过程。It then defines two thread procedures. 第一个定义为用于汇集键盘的 lambda 表达式，当按下 "C" 键时， 将调用以将取消标记设置为 "已取消" 状态。The first is defined as a lambda expression that pools the keyboard and, when the "C" key is pressed, calls to set the cancellation token to the cancelled state. 第二个是参数化方法， `ServerClass.StaticMethod` 它执行循环，直到 属性为 `true` 。The second is a parameterized method, `ServerClass.StaticMethod`, that executes a loop until the property is `true`. 然后，主线程将启动两个线程和块，直到执行方法的线程 `ServerClass.StaticMethod` 终止。The main thread then starts the two threads and blocks until the thread that executes the `ServerClass.StaticMethod` method terminates.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property None As CancellationToken
public: static property System::Threading::CancellationToken None { System::Threading::CancellationToken get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")>]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的取消标记无法取消;也就是说，其 属性为 `false` 。The cancellation token returned by this property cannot be canceled; that is, its property is `false`. 你还可以使用 c # [默认 (CancellationToken) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default) 语句来创建空取消标记。You can also use the C# [default(CancellationToken)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default) statement to create an empty cancellation token. 两个空取消标记始终相等。Two empty cancellation tokens are always equal.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration Register(class System.Action callback) cil managed
Public Function Register (callback As Action) As CancellationTokenRegistration

param.name: callback
param.span: 要在取消 时执行的委托。

span.span: The delegate to be executed when the is canceled.

summary.span: 注册一个将在取消此 时调用的委托。

span.span: Registers a delegate that will be called when this is canceled.

returns.span: 可用于注销回调的 实例。

span.span: The instance that can be used to unregister the callback.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此标记已处于 "已取消" 状态，则委托将立即和同步运行。If this token is already in the canceled state, the delegate will be run immediately and synchronously. 此方法调用将传播委托生成的任何异常。Any exception the delegate generates will be propagated out of this method call. 当前 与委托一起捕获，并将在执行时使用。The current is captured along with the delegate and will be used when executing it. 不捕获当前。The current is not captured.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此标记已处于 "已取消" 状态，则委托将立即和同步运行。If this token is already in the canceled state, the delegate will be run immediately and synchronously. 此方法调用将传播委托生成的任何异常。Any exception the delegate generates will be propagated out of this method call. 当前 与委托一起捕获，并将在执行时使用。The current is captured along with the delegate and will be used when executing it. 如果 `useSynchronizationContext` 为 `true` ，则当前的 （如果存在）还将与委托一起捕获，并在执行时使用。If `useSynchronizationContext` is `true`, the current , if one exists, is also captured along with the delegate and will be used when executing it. 否则， 将不会捕获。Otherwise, is not captured.

span.span: Throws a if this token has had cancellation requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供等效于的功能：This method provides functionality equivalent to: C#C# ```csharp if (token.IsCancellationRequested) throw new OperationCanceledException(token); ``` ```vb If token.IsCancellationRequested Then Throw New OperationCanceledException(token) End If ```

span.span: The token has had cancellation requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果访问此属性，则会 实例化。Accessing this property causes a to be instantiated. 最好只在必要时使用此属性，然后在最早的机会中释放关联的 实例， (释放源将释放此分配的句柄) 。It is preferable to only use this property when necessary, and to then dispose the associated instance at the earliest opportunity (disposing the source will dispose of this allocated handle). 不应直接关闭或释放该句柄。The handle should not be closed or disposed directly.

related.span: 如何：侦听具有等待句柄的取消请求

span.span: How to: Listen for Cancellation Requests That Have Wait Handles
